flavorText:
"A mind in agony is a sparrow without wings."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

foreignData.name: Geistespeitsche
foreignData.text: Der Beherrscher der verzauberten Kreatur muß während seiner Versorgungsphase 3 bezahlen oder die Geistespeitsche fügt ihm 2 Schadenspunkte zu. Tappe diese Kreatur, wenn die Geistespeitsche auf diese Art Schaden zufügt.

name: Mind Whip
originalText: During target creature's controller's upkeep, he or she pays o3 or Mind Whip deals 2 damage to him or her. If Mind Whip deals damage in this way, tap that creature.
text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {3}. If they don't, Mind Whip deals 2 damage to that player and you tap that creature.
